name: House For Sale
description: An establishment offering food, drink, or lodging; adventurers can rest, meet informants, or overhear tavern talk.
atmosphere: The house has an empty, transitional atmosphere with the scent of fresh paint and the subtle tang of opportunity. The air carries the promise of new beginnings and the possibilities of home ownership, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of change and the potential for a fresh start.
